eg

Class TabbedDocuments

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.TabbedDocuments

  • public class TabbedDocuments
extends java.lang.Object
    The documents in the tabs.

    Documents viewed when tabs are selected are represented by objects of EditableDocument. If the tabbar is set invisible (see ExtTabbedPane) the viewed document is regarded as (and technically is) the 'selected document'.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TabbedDocuments(MainWin mw, Formatter format) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeLanguage(Languages lang)
      Changes this language and sets the language in the selected document
      void close(boolean createBlankDoc)
      Closes the selected tab and may ask to save the content of the document before closing
      void closeAll(boolean createBlankDoc)
      Closes all tabs and may ask to save the content of documents before closing
      boolean closeForExit()
      Closes all tabs and may ask to save the content of documents before closing; saves properties to 'Prefs'
      void createBlankDocument()
      Creates a new tab with a blank document in which this language is set
      void open()
      Opens a tab with a document in which a file selected in the file chooser is set
      void print()
      Prints the text content in the selected document to a printer
      void save()
      Saves the text content in the selected document to its file or uses saveAs() if no file is set in the document or a set file no more exists.
      void saveAll()
      Saves the text content in all documents that have an existing file
      void saveAs()
      Saves the text content in the selected document as a new file that is selected in the file chooser and sets the file in the document
      void saveCopy()
      Saves a copy of the content in the selected document as new file that is specified in the file chooser but does not set the file in the document

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Opens a tab with a document in which a file selected in the file chooser is set

        public void save()
        Saves the text content in the selected document to its file or uses saveAs() if no file is set in the document or a set file no more exists.

        public void saveAs()
        Saves the text content in the selected document as a new file that is selected in the file chooser and sets the file in the document

      • saveAll

        public void saveAll()
        Saves the text content in all documents that have an existing file

        public void saveCopy()
        Saves a copy of the content in the selected document as new file that is specified in the file chooser but does not set the file in the document

      • close

        public void close(boolean createBlankDoc)
        Closes the selected tab and may ask to save the content of the document before closing
        Parameters:
        createBlankDoc - the boolean that is true to create a new tab with a blank document if the tab to be closed is the only open tab

      • closeAll

        public void closeAll(boolean createBlankDoc)
        Closes all tabs and may ask to save the content of documents before closing
        Parameters:
        createBlankDoc - the boolean value that is true to create a new blank document after closing

      • closeForExit

        public boolean closeForExit()
        Closes all tabs and may ask to save the content of documents before closing; saves properties to 'Prefs'
        Returns:
        true if all tabs were closed, false otherwise

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints the text content in the selected document to a printer
